attributes.action: Make Jenny Bendell the new Prime Minister or at least an advisor to the PM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jenny Bendell is a hard working Mum of five, she understands the difficulties and challenges of normal family life. She is articulate and know her own mind. If she can't sort this country out no body can. Please make the amazing, awe inspiring and irrepressible Jenny Bendell Prime Minister.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
